messages.message:
Hi team! I’m trying to run Python unit test for the first time and I’m seeing `mypy` errors:
I’m running `make build mypy` in api-server service according to this doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/13oZcTClAgwbsCfjnMMNTHdBr_Kfzl0YCjVTx5ulvigU/edit#). Anyone has idea on how to fix it? :woman-bowing:
```ERROR MESSAGE: b'Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/xindixu/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/bin/mypy", line 5, in <module>
    from mypy.__main__ import console_entry
  File "/Users/xindixu/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mypy/__main__.py", line 3, in <module>
    from mypy.main import main
  File "/Users/xindixu/.pyenv/versions/3.7.13/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mypy/main.py", line 14, in <module>
    from mypy import build
  File "mypy/build.py", line 35, in <module>
  File "mypy/nodes.py", line 9, in <module>
AttributeError: module 'mypy_extensions' has no attribute 'trait'
'
STDOUT:
make: *** [mypy] Error 1```
I feel like I see this once a year and forget how to fix it each time... try running `python -m pip install -U mypy==0.701`
